mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_msg ( chat_room_seq, trade_seq, sender_seq, chat_cont, sent_dtm, read_yn ) VALUES ( #{chat_room_seq}, #{trade_seq}, #{sender_seq}, #{chat_cont}, now(), false )
mapper.select: SELECT chat_msg_seq, chat_room_seq, sender_seq, chat_cont, sent_dtm, read_yn FROM chat_msg WHERE chat_room_seq = #{chat_room_seq} ORDER BY sent_dtm ASC
